name: backlogged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
delayed because of a large number of things that are waiting to be dealt with: Extra staff have been taken on to process backlogged citizenship applications. The sunglasses are so popular that orders are backlogged for months.
More examplesFewer examplesManufacturers are racing to fill backlogged orders. People growing weary of the nation's backlogged court system are finding other ways to settle their legal disputes.Defendants have a right to speedy appeals, but they are seriously backlogged.They estimate it will take two years to clear the backlogged inventory.Backlogged courts and local corruption have made the judicial system ineffective.
